description:
The 74th annual Golden Globe Awards nominations were revealed on Monday morning (Dec. 12) with past winners Don Cheadle and Laura Dern and nominee Anna Kendrick doing the honors from the Beverly Hilton Hotel in Los Angeles. Among the early leaders on TV were The People v. O.J. Simpson: American Crime Story, which had five nominations, and The Night Managerwith four. In the movie field, movie musical La La Land leads all film nominees with seven nods, edging out the acclaimed drama Moonlight, which had six.12月12日（周一）早上，第74届金球奖提名出炉，往届金球奖获奖演员唐·钱德尔、劳拉·邓恩以及曾获金球奖提名的安娜·肯德里克在洛杉矶比佛利希尔顿酒店宣读多个奖项的竞争人选。电视剧类，《美国犯罪故事：人民对阵辛普森》获得5项提名再度领跑，《夜班经理》获得4项提名。电影类方面，《爱乐之城》获得电影类7项提名，超越获得6项提名的《月光男孩》。
